data.title: What is the difference between a feature film and movie?
data.meta_description:
Answer (1 of 12): Basically length is the main difference between movie and feature film.

Feature film has to be minimum of 40 minutes or more.while movie can be of any length,more or less than 40 minutes.apart from this there is no such difference.

Basically Movies are of two types-
